title: (x) What is the on air MSNBC sans serif? - Pill Gothic {Chris K}
content:
Trying to identify this font. any ideas...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202102741im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_3683.jpg)
author: korpics

comments.content:
It looks like [Pill Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202102741/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/).  
The "O" and "V" look wider here though.

thanks for taking a stab at it Chris...

-korpics
